column1: [Highlight] Kelan Martin makes a questionable decision jumping with Zach LaVine on this jam
[Highlight] Kelan Martin makes a questionable decision jumping with Zach LaVine on this jam
[Highlight] TJ Mcconnell gets the steal and feeds it to Kelan Martin who beats the buzzer, pushing the lead to 14.

(Plus/Minus Review) Fred Van Vleet and Kelan Martin led all players last night in "plus/minus" - notching a +14 in wins for Toronto and Indiana against the Sixers and Jazz. The following players all led their respective teams - Eric Bledsoe
